    • Method Detail

      • addAngel

        public void addAngel(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String photo,
                     java.lang.String prayer,
                     int day,
                     java.lang.String month,
                     java.lang.String skill,
                     java.lang.String color,
                     double size,
                     java.lang.String essence,
                     double illuminance)
        This method add a new angel to the legion.
        pre: The list of angels must be initialized.
        post: The angel has been created.
        Parameters:
        name - The angel name.
        photo - The angel photo.
        prayer - The angel prayer.
        day - The angel celebration day.
        month - The angel celebration month.
        skill - The angel skill.
        color - The candle color.
        size - The candle size.
        essence - The candle essence.
        illuminance - The candle illuminance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the list of angels is of another datatype or hasn't been initialized.

      • searchAngel

        public java.lang.String searchAngel(int index,
                                    java.lang.String search)
        This method search one angel.
        pre: The list of angels must be initialized and the parameters must be coincide with the reqeriments.
        post: The angel's information has been shown.
        Parameters:
        index - The type of search, name or skill.
        search - The name or skill to search.
        Returns:
        The angel's information is show.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the angel name or angel skill doesn't exist.

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • checkMonth

        public static boolean checkMonth(java.lang.String month)
        This method check if the given month is correct acording to the gregorian calendar.
        pre: The month must be correct acording to the gregorian calendar.
        post: The given month is correct or incorrect.
        Parameters:
        month - The month to evaluate.
        Returns:
        True if the given month corresponds to the months in the calendar or false if the month is incorrect.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the month doesn't corresponds to the given month.

      • correctlyMonth

        public static java.lang.String correctlyMonth(java.lang.String month)
        This method change the given text month for other with correct writing acords to the gregorian calendar.
        pre: The month must be correspond to the requeriments.
        post: The given month has been changed to a correct text month.
        Parameters:
        month - The month to change in text.
        Returns:
        A text of month in format of gregorian calendar.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the month doesn't corresponds to the gregorian calendar.
